item.description: Best Friends Pet Care in Rocky Hill will be hosting a howl-i-day meet up this December! It's free to the public to bring their pooches to play. We have a large indoor playroom, so when it starts to get too cold to play outside, there is somewhere to exercise your dogs. We provide toys, water, and clean up. All breeds are welcome, all friendly dogs are welcome. Come in from the cold! and join us for some socialization. We do require dogs to be up to date with vaccines: rabies, distemper, and bordetella. Check with your vet to be sure they are current. Hope to see you and your poochies this howl-iday season!

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: Howl-i-day Fun!!
